ch.ethz.khammash.ode

Interface Solver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptiveEulerSolver, AdaptiveRungeKutta4thOrderSolver, CVodeSolver, EulerSolver, ImplicitEulerSolver, LsodarDirectSolver, LsodarSolver, RungeKutta4thOrderSolver

    public interface Solver
    An Interface for solving an Ode.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Solver.InitializationException
      The Class InitializationException.
      static class  Solver.IntegrationException
      The Class IntegrationException.
      static class  Solver.NotImplementedException
      The Class NotImplementedException.
      static class  Solver.NotYetInitializedException
      The Class NotYetInitializedException.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Dispose the solver.

      Initialize the solver.

      Integrate the ODE.

      Integrate the ODE.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Ode ode,
              EventFunction ef,
              StateObserver stateObserver,
              EventObserver eventObserver)
                throws Solver.InitializationException
        Initialize the solver.
        Parameters:
        ode - the ODE to solve
        ef - the function defining the roots to be found
        stateObserver - the observer of the states at the integration time-steps
        eventObserver - the observer of the root functions
        Throws:
        Solver.InitializationException - if there was a problem during initialization

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Dispose the solver. This is important for solvers that make use of JNI.

      • prepare

        void prepare(TimepointProvider timepointProvider,
           double[] x0)
        Prepare a call to integrate().
        Parameters:
        timepointProvider - defines the time-steps for the integration
        x0 - the initial state

      • integrate

        double integrate()
                 throws Solver.IntegrationException,
                        Solver.NotYetInitializedException
        Integrate the ODE. The user is responsible to call prepare(ch.ethz.khammash.ode.TimepointProvider, double[]) before calling this function.
        Returns:
        the time where the integration has stopped
        Throws:
        Solver.IntegrationException - if there was a problem during the integration
        Solver.NotYetInitializedException - if initialize(ch.ethz.khammash.ode.Ode, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.EventFunction, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.StateObserver, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.EventObserver) has not been called before

      • integrate

        double integrate(double t0,
               double[] x0,
               double t1)
                 throws Solver.IntegrationException,
                        Solver.NotImplementedException,
                        Solver.NotYetInitializedException
        Integrate the ODE.
        Parameters:
        t0 - the start time of the integration
        x0 - the initial state
        t1 - the stop time of the integration
        Returns:
        the time where the integration has stopped
        Throws:
        Solver.IntegrationException - if there was a problem during the integration
        Solver.NotImplementedException - if the solver only implements integration with TimepointProviders
        Solver.NotYetInitializedException - if initialize(ch.ethz.khammash.ode.Ode, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.EventFunction, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.StateObserver, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.EventObserver) has not been called before

      • integrate

        double integrate(TimepointProvider timepointProvider,
               double[] x0)
                 throws Solver.IntegrationException,
                        Solver.NotYetInitializedException
        Integrate the ODE.
        Parameters:
        timepointProvider - defines the time-steps for the integration
        x0 - the initial state
        Returns:
        the time where the integration has stopped
        Throws:
        Solver.IntegrationException - if there was a problem during the integration
        Solver.NotYetInitializedException - if initialize(ch.ethz.khammash.ode.Ode, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.EventFunction, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.StateObserver, ch.ethz.khammash.ode.EventObserver) has not been called before
